summary: This module implements a diffusion‑based text‑to‑video pipeline. It combines a frozen T5 text encoder, a 3‑D variational auto‑encoder, a transformer denoiser, and a scheduler to iteratively refine latent video representations, finally decoding them into video frames. Helper utilities manage timestep selection and other preprocessing steps.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use solution for generating video clips from natural language prompts, supporting creative content creation, advertising, entertainment, and rapid prototyping of visual ideas.
